snippet.title: Pop Islands
snippet.description:
Switch, Catch & Combine to save hundreds of tiny Pops bottled up !

Take advantage of different Magics to sail through more than 100 levels in this fun and addictive new puzzle adventure ! 

6 different games, It's FREE for Iphone & Android ! And it's waiting for you !


Please note Pop Islands is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra characters or lives will require payment.

-------------------------------

Join our hero PJO and his friends into their epic adventure through this magical world !

Your puzzle skills will be hardly tested ! Use Bombs, Explosive Thunders, Water ball, Time Shift and much more to help you pass all the island levels and get a STAR ! 

Collect them STARS to access into the 10 different islands.

Play main course and minigames and get coins, to buy lives, characters and much more !





-------------------------------

Features:


● more than 100 levels with more to come!
● Innovative puzzle-combine game-play mechanics
● Unique Cute Characters, each one with a different Magic
● Hours of replay value with the many minigames !
